name: User Register Filter
author: Tible Technologies

sections.description:
Restringe el registro de usuarios en tu WordPress en funciÃ³n de las reglas que especifiques: lista negra de dominios, de extensiones, de nombres, filtrado inteligente anti bots, listas blancas…

Features included:

  • Deny registration if email ends with…
  • Smart filtering (detects suspicious behaviours)

Suggestions?

If you have suggestions for a new feature or you found a bug, feel free to email us via https://tibletech.com/contact.

Stay tuned!

Want regular updates and interesting info about Website Development? Follow us on… Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus and LinkedIn.

Translations

  • English (EN): default, always included.
  • Spanish (ES): we have Spanish blood.

All our plugins are localized/translateable by default. This is very important for all users worldwide. So please contribute your language to the plugin to make it even more useful.
sections.installation:
Install like any other plugin. Don’t forget to activate it!

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/tt-user-register-filter directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the User Register Filter screen to configure the plugin.
  4. That’s all. No necessary changes to .htaccess or other config files.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Install like any other plugin. Don’t forget to activate it!

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/tt-user-register-filter directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the User Register Filter screen to configure the plugin.
  4. That’s all. No necessary changes to .htaccess or other config files.

Does this plugin work with nginx?

Yes. Apache, nginx or whatever you use to run WordPress. It relies 100% in php and DataBase only.

Is this plugin translation compatible?

Yes. It is fully translatable via po/mo files. By now, plugin includes English and Spanish translations. You can add the translation you need or ask us to include it! We will do it with pleasure.
